events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position and will begin reviewing the credentials submitted.
The application has been categorised under the engineering department due to the candidate's experience in software development and devOps practices.
A recruiter has been assigned to oversee the candidate's hiring process to ensure smooth communication and follow-up on next steps.
The initial screening call completed successfully. The candidate demonstrated solid knowledge in software engineering fundamentals and relevant tools.
The candidate responded promptly to our screening outcomes and expressed strong interest in progressing to the technical interview stage.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate next week to assess deeper software engineering skills, including coding and system design.
